div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex/CodeSystem/EndpointHieSpecificConnectionTypeCS defines the following codes:

tr.td: XCPD-InitGateway-PatientDiscovery-AsyncResponse
